q: David Letterman did a comedy bit many, many years ago called`` cause and effect,'' or something like that. We recall one of David Letterman 's jokes went like this: Cause: Millions of prairie dogs die of a mysterious disease.`` Effect: McRibs for a limited time. Anyway, that came to mind when we first heard about the documentary Return of the Prairie Bandit, which airs Thursday, Feb. 10 as part of The Nature of Things with David Suzuki on CBC.

Microsoft( Nasdaq: MSFT) CEO Steve Ballmer debuted the cloud version of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011 release on Monday. Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business, Steve Ballmer said. Microsoft Dynamics CRM gives them a familiar user experience, enables greater collaboration, streamlines processes, and provides access to real-time data that helps them compete more effectively, he noted.
